items.content_html: DOBBER is a lightweight, modular agent framework that lets AI securely manage revenue-generating DePIN devices. Built for real-world automation, it enables on-chain coordination, reward routing, and intelligent operations—turning physical machines into autonomous digital businesses.

Built for real-world automation, it enables on-chain coordination, reward routing, and intelligent operations—turning physical machines into autonomous digital businesses.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A lightweight, accessible Chrome extension that provides a full-featured scientific calculator directly in your browser. Perform basic arithmetic operations and advanced mathematical functions (sin, cos, tan, logarithms, and more) with a clean, intuitive interface.
items.title: amjrotich/chrome-extension-sci-calc: A lightweight, accessible Chrome extension that provides a full-featured scientific calculator directly in your browser. Perform basic arithmetic operations and advanced mathematical functions (sin, cos, tan, logarithms, and more) with a clean, intuitive interface.
